Description: Secure AWS infrastructure for web application with enterprise security controls, MFA enforcement, IP restrictions, and comprehensive monitoring

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for resource naming (passed from deployment script)

AllowedIPRange.Description: IP range allowed to access resources (CIDR notation)

EnableMFA.Description: Enable MFA enforcement for IAM policies

CredentialRotationDays.Description: Number of days between credential rotations

LogRetentionDays.Description: CloudWatch log retention period in days

Description.Fn::Sub: KMS key for encrypting ${EnvironmentSuffix} application data

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for web application with restricted access

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: HTTPS access from allowed IP range
HTTP access from allowed IP range (redirect to HTTPS)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for database with restricted access

Description.Fn::Sub: Rotate IAM user credentials every ${CredentialRotationDays} days

Properties.Description: Secure storage for application user credentials

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alarm for console sign-ins without MFA

KMSKeyId.Description: ID of the KMS key for encryption

LogBucketName.Description: Name of the secure log storage bucket

ApplicationBucketName.Description: Name of the application data bucket

EC2InstanceRoleArn.Description: ARN of the EC2 instance role

EC2InstanceProfileArn.Description: ARN of the EC2 instance profile

WebAppSecurityGroupId.Description: ID of the web application security group

DatabaseSecurityGroupId.Description: ID of the database security group

SecurityAlertsTopicArn.Description: ARN of the security alerts SNS topic

RestrictedUserArn.Description: ARN of the restricted IAM user

CredentialRotationLambdaArn.Description: ARN of the credential rotation Lambda function

UserCredentialsSecretArn.Description: ARN of the user credentials secret
